sentences.en: Accurate progressive scanning technology, high definition image rebroadcast, reproducing ultimate beautiful pictures.
sentences.cn: 精确逐行扫描技术，高清晰影像重播，再现至美画面。

sentences.en: May 15 th will be the rebroadcast of the show from the very beginning.
sentences.cn: 5月15日我们从头开始重播现有的一套节目.

sentences.en: The messages of the second day transmission were a rebroadcast.
sentences.cn: 这些电文通常在播出后的次日有一次重播。

sentences.en: The station will rebroadcast the exhibition match this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 今天下午电视台会重播这场表演比赛。

sentences.en: The system the RTSP feedback mechanism ensure qos and employed multi - cast to rebroadcast programs to clients.
sentences.cn: 该系统基于RTSP等流媒体协议,采用组播等通信方式实现 多用户 电视转播.

sentences.en: The TV station will rebroadcast the exhibition match this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 今天下午电视台会转播这场表演赛.

sentences.en: There's no rebroadcast of the soccer game tonight.
sentences.cn: 今晚没有足球赛的转播了。

words.tran_cn: [广播]重播；转播；重播（或转播）的节目
